name: Pattie Harris
coverLetter:
Dear Sir or ma'am,


I am applying for any trim jobs you have available. I am willing to work for minimal or entry-level wages. I used to own my own landscaping company. I did design work, installation, procurement and maintenance of landscaping materials and plants. My company did maintenance of everything except lawn mowing. I installed sprinkler systems and did light construction. Additionally I have been a teacher of special ed for 36 years. I am retired now and looking for supplemental income. I know a lot about plants. I have grown my own cannabis plants in the past but have limited experience with that specific type of horticulture. I learned very quickly. I am reliable and a hard worker. I arrive to work on time and I stay focused in my duties while at work. I am responsible and will do a great job in any field I endeavor. I'll be happy to supply a resume on request as well as references. I thank you for your consideration.


Pattie Harris

619-581-9870
